ACDM Estimation

Wenchao

2018-08-26

Source: vignettes/OnlineExercises/ACDM_example.Rmd
ACDM_example.Rmd
library(GDINA)
## GDINA Package [Version 2.1.20; 2018-8-24]
## For examples and more information, 
## see https://wenchao-ma.github.io/GDINA
# A simulated data in GDINA package
dat <- sim10GDINA$simdat
Q <- sim10GDINA$simQ

# Fit ACDM model
est <- GDINA(dat = dat, Q = Q, model = "ACDM")
##

#####################################
#
#           Plots
# 
#####################################

#plot item response functions for item 10
plot(est, item = 10)

plot(est, item = 10, withSE = TRUE) # with error bars

#plot mastery probability for individuals 1, 20 and 50
plot(est, what = "mp", person = c(1, 20, 50))
